title: Renovated 1BR Walking Distance to Runyon Canyon!
map_address: 1530 N Poinsettia Place near Sunset Blvd
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 756 Sq.

Scout Off Sunset offers epic studio, one-, and two-bedroom apartment homes that strike the perfect balance between comfort and contemporary style, providing you the ultimate space to create your ideal home.
Each sun-drenched residence boasts a unique floor plan featuring spacious rooms, distinctive wood-style flooring in living areas, ample closet space, and modern kitchens.
Select apartment homes feature a personal balcony or patio.
Now’s your chance to choose your favorite floor plan and create your ultimate Hollywood home.

Fireplace-Gas burning, Granite/Quartz countertops, Spacious and bright studio, one and two-bedroom floor plans, Energy Star Certified, Private patio or balcony, Spacious closets, Pet friendly, Modern, Stylish Kitchen, Central air conditioning and heating, Stainless steel appliances, 9' vaulted ceiling

Fitness center, Paw Spa, Package Lockers, Storage, Swimming pool and spa, Controlled access, EV Parking Stations, Bike Racks, Onsite management and maintenance staff, Assigned parking, Laundry Facility, Outdoor BBQ
We are a pet-friendly community providing waste dispensers and collection points around the property.
